# Sleeping Through the War

| recorded   =

Sleeping Through the War is the fourth studio album by American band All Them Witches. It was released in February 2017 under New West Records.
|rev2=The Line of Best Fit
|rev2Score=8.5/10
|rev3=AllMusic
|rev3Score=
